statement.p: Find the volume of the composite figure below which consists of a square prims with a square pyramid on top. The sides of the square have length \displaystyle{10.0} cm. The height of the prism is \displaystyle{12.0} cm, and the total height is \displaystyle{30.0} cm.
All measurements are in centimeters. Round according to rules for measurements.
Calculate the volume of just the square prism.
Calculate the volume of just the pyramid.
